item.description:
Sharing October's Free Class at Wayland Wellness with you:


Meditation Can Be Easy!


Friday Evening, October 23rd, 7:15 –8:30pm, Wayland Wellness, 15 East Plain St., Wayland, MA 01778

Are you aware of the benefits of meditating, but can’t get yourself to do it or you think it’s too difficult?

Meditation can be one of the easiest and most effective means to living with greater harmony, happiness and well-being. It’s an opportunity to peacefully transform your problems, your fears, and any pain and stress in your life into something more positive. And, it's a great way to set or shift into the perfect mood for your day, feeling perfectly aligned with all that you desire.
• You don’t have to sit in silence for long periods of time to gain the multitude of emotional and physical benefits!

Come to this Free Introduction to Meditation Class and experience how simple and delightful it can be.

You’ll learn:
• Some simple techniques you can do for yourself for any length of time that is comfortable for you.
• How to easily get into a meditative state and create pleasurable feelings.
• The difference between active and passive meditation.
• What you can use meditation for.

We will not be doing traditional silent meditations. The class will consist of 2-3 guided meditations. All you have to do is let go and listen to Ann’s voice as she leads you through the process, like listening to a good story.

The meditations will leave you totally relaxed with magnificent feelings of peace, love, happiness and hope - essentially feeling really, really good!

All are welcome. Please share this with your e-mail lists and groups, your friends, and your family! It's a wonderful evening - like going on a mini retreat! All you need to do is rsvp with your guests on this meetup site, or have them e-mail me their name, e-mail and phone # to AnnIde@NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com.

*** If you prefer to meditate lying down, please bring whatever you might need to be comfortable: mat, pillow, blanket, etc.

This class is co-sponsored by Wayland Wellness and New Possibilities Coaching as a free service to their clients and the surrounding communities.
